Grab images. Optionally use `config edit` first to create a config

Command Flags:

  --log-filename : Log filename
    type : path
    default : ~/.config/grabbit.jsonl
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.filename
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : ~/.config/grabbit.jsonl

  --log-maxage : Max age before log rotation in days
    type : int
    default : 30
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.maxage
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : 30

  --log-maxbackups : Num backups for the log
    type : int
    default : 0
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.maxbackups
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : 0

  --log-maxsize : Max size of log in megabytes
    type : int
    default : 5
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.maxsize
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : 5

  --subreddit-destination , -sd : Where to store the subreddit
    type : path
    default : [. .]
    configpath : subreddits[].destination
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      0) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      1) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      2) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      3) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      4) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      5) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      6) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      7) ~/Pictures/grabbit
      8) ~/Pictures/grabbit

  --subreddit-limit , -sl : Max number of links to try to download
    type : int
    default : [2 3]
    configpath : subreddits[].limit
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      0) 2
      1) 1
      2) 4
      3) 10
      4) 1
      5) 3
      6) 2
      7) 1
      8) 2

  --subreddit-name , -sn : Subreddit to grab
    type : string
    default : [earthporn wallpapers]
    configpath : subreddits[].name
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      0) architectureporn
      1) churchporn
      2) cityporn
      3) earthporn
      4) futureporn
      5) imaginarycastles
      6) villageporn
      7) roomporn
      8) wallpapers

  --subreddit-timeframe , -st : Take the top subreddits from this timeframe
    type : string
    choices : [day week month year all]
    default : [week week]
    configpath : subreddits[].timeframe
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      0) week
      1) week
      2) week
      3) week
      4) week
      5) week
      6) week
      7) week
      8) week

  --timeout , -t : Timeout for a single download
    type : duration
    default : 30s
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : 30s

Inherited Section Flags:

  --config , -c : Config filepath
    type : path
    default : ~/.config/grabbit.yaml
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : ~/.config/grabbit.yaml

  --help , -h : Print help
    type : string
    choices : [default detailed outline allcommands]
    default : default
    currentvalue (set by passedflag) : detailed
